definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu

sentences.english: This chapter introduces the vocalic inventory of Polish.
sentences.chinese: 這一章講了波蘭語的元音表。

sentences.english: I speak Polish, because I was born in Poland.
sentences.chinese: 我說波蘭語，因爲我出生于波蘭。

sentences.english: He translated not only from the French but also, on occasion, from the Polish .
sentences.chinese: 他不僅做法文翻譯，有時也做些波蘭語翻譯。
